title: Experience-Based Learning to Overcome Barriers to Disclosing Abuse

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Psychology and Social Support Systems
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based learning environment, learners engage via short modules accessible during work tasks

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major barriers that occur when disclosing abuse experiences
Learners can apply effective communication strategies to real-world cases when requesting support
Based on peer feedback, learners can develop action plans to improve barriers to disclosing abuse experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
